trans-unit.source: Specifies values that indicates whether data should be encrypted or decrypted, whether a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended or validated, or both.

Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data and that the data should be encrypted (for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.Encode"></xref> method) or that the data should be both decrypted and validated (for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.Decode"></xref> method).
Specifies that the data should be encrypted (for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.Encode"></xref> method) or decrypted (for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.Decode"></xref> method).

Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data (for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.Encode"></xref> method) or validated (for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.Decode"></xref> method).
